body.p: A hedged item can be a recognised asset or liability, an unrecognised firm commitment, a forecast transaction or a net investment in a foreign operation. The hedged item can be:

li.p: a group of items (subject to paragraphs 6.6.1–6.6.6 and B6.6.1–B6.6.16).

body.p: A hedged item can also be a component of such an item or group of items (see paragraphs 6.3.7 and B6.3.7–B6.3.25).
